text:
May 2, 2018 / 12:43 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-California Water Service To Urge SJW Stockholders To Vote Against Proposed Merger With Connecticut Water Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
May 2 (Reuters) - Connecticut Water Service Inc:
* CALIFORNIA WATER SERVICE GROUP FILES PRELIMINARY PROXY MATERIALS TO URGE SJW GROUPâ€™S STOCKHOLDERS TO VOTE AGAINST PROPOSED MERGER WITH CONNECTICUT WATER Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
